casebody.data:
WATER FUN PRODUCTS CORP., Plaintiff-Appellant v. PROSLIDE TECHNOLOGY, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-1560. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2007.

Before MICHEL, Chief Judge, ARCHER, Senior Judge, and DYK, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
